commit message: Change the way we deal with devices lacking a sensor.  Instead of blocking the use of automode, we just warn the user that it might not work.  This is because some devices like the Moto E are falsely marketed as lacking a compass (and the SensorManager reports its absence)...but they actually do have one and Sky Map works on them just fine.  Yay marketing.

Merge pull request #69 from sky-map-team/allowautomodeevenforphoneswhichreportnocompass

Change the way we deal with devices lacking a sensor.

A quick fix to the timetravel dialog.  On some devices it was showing as white on white.
Needs further work.
